actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize additional funds for grants for the construction of treatment works which are required for compliance with international pollution control agreements.

summary.text: Authorizes up to $100,000,000, under the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, for grants for the construction of treatment works which are required for compliance with pollution control agreements between the United States and any other nation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Water Pollution Control Act to authorize additional funds for grants for the construction of treatment works which are required for compliance with international pollution control agreements.
